summary: Completed comprehensive backend API testing for CallVault production hardening. All critical endpoints including health checks, diagnostics, WebRTC configuration, call session tokens, and WebSocket messaging are fully functional with 100% success rate.

configuration_issues.issue: DATABASE_URL not configured - using ephemeral tokens
configuration_issues.impact: Database-dependent features use fallback mode without replay protection
configuration_issues.recommendation: Set DATABASE_URL environment variable for PostgreSQL connection to enable full database features

configuration_issues.impact: Using free public TURN servers suitable for testing but not production scale
configuration_issues.recommendation: Configure custom TURN server with TURN_MODE=custom for production scale (current setup works for testing)

passed_tests: Root health check endpoint (/) - returns 'CallVault backend is running'
API health endpoint (/api/health) - returns JSON with timestamp
Version endpoint (/api/version) - returns app info and build details
Diagnostics endpoint (/api/diagnostics) - returns comprehensive system status
ICE verification endpoint (/api/ice-verify) - returns WebRTC configuration status with no issues
TURN config endpoint (/api/turn-config) - returns ICE servers array (6 servers: 3 STUN, 3 TURN)
Server time endpoint (/api/server-time) - returns synchronized server time
Call session token endpoint (POST /api/call-session-token) - returns token, nonce, iceServers without database
WebSocket endpoint (/ws) - accepts connections and responds to ping with pong
